regex:
shell command[sudo PYTHONPATH=/usr/local/zstack/ansible/files/zstacklib timeout 1800 python /usr/local/zstack/ansible/kvm.py -i /usr/local/zstack/ansible/hosts --private-key /usr/local/zstack/apache-tomcat-7.0.35/webapps/zstack/WEB-INF/classes/ansible/rsaKeys/id_rsa -e '{"chrony_servers":"","trusted_host":"","remote_port":"22","update_packages":"false","zstack_root":"/var/lib/zstack","remote_user":"root","hostname":"10-0-121-175.zstack.org","pkg_kvmagent":"kvmagent-3.2.0.tar.gz","post_url":"http://%s:8080/zstack/kvm/ansiblelog/%s\n","remote_pass":"******","host":"%s","pip_url":"http://%s:8080/zstack/static/pypi/simple","zstack_repo":"\"zstack-mn,qemu-kvm-ev-mn\"","yum_server":"%s:8080","pkg_zstacklib":"zstacklib-3.2.0.tar.gz"}'] failed
 ret code: 1
causes_cn: pip安装文件不完整，或者pip版本不正确

message_cn: 物理机正在连接, 不能进行ping操作
operation_cn: 请等待物理机退出连接中状态
operation_en: please wait until quit connecting status

regex: User name or password or port number may be problematic
message_cn: 用户名、密码或者端口可能是错误的
message_en: User name or password or port number may be problematic

regex: host[uuid:%s, name:%s] is in status[%s], cannot perform required operation
message_cn: 物理机不能进行该操作
causes_cn: 物理机正处于连接中[%3$s]状态
operation_cn: 请等待物理机退出连接中[%3$s]状态
operation_en: please wait until quit Connecting status

regex: unable to do the operation because the host is in status of Disconnected
message_cn: 物理机不能进行该操作
causes_cn: 物理机正处于己失联[Disconnected]状态
operation_cn: 请等待物理机进入己连接[Connected]状态
operation_en: please wait until quit Connected status

regex: unable to connect to KVM[ip:%s, username:root, sshPort:%s] to check the management node connectivity,please check if username/password is wrong; null
causes_cn: 物理机的ssh端口与管理节点不通
causes_en: ssh port on host unable to connect to management node
operation_cn: 请检查ssh端口的用户名或密码是否有误
operation_en: please check if username/password is wrong on the ssh port
